summary: Four families in LA of different ethnicity (Latino, Asian/Vietnamese, African and Jewish) gather together for Thanksgiving dinner.
cast: Mercedes Ruehl|Victor Rivers|Douglas Spain|Maria Carmen|Isidra Vega|Elena Lopez|A Martinez|Richard Yniguez|Lorraine Perez|Eva Rodriguez|Adrian Armas|Caz|Joan Chen|François Chau|Will Yun Lee|Kristy Wu|Brennan Louie|Jimmy Pham|Kieu Chinh|Chao Li Chi|Chad Todhunter|Scott Nguyen|Lainie Kazan|Maury Chaykin|Kyra Sedgwick|Julianna Margulies|Albie Selznick|Suzanne Carney|Estelle Harris|Ralph Manza|Andrew Heckler|Marty|Alfre Woodard|Dennis Haysbert|Eric George|Brittany Jean Henry|Ann Weldon|Shareen Mitchell|Gregory Itzin|Mariam Parris|Frank Novak|Margie Loomis|Gwendolyn Oliver|Charles Constant|Bruce Dobos|Darren O'Bannon|Jeremy Berger|Alexandra Beres
title: ¿Qué se está cociendo?
